multiplechoiceresponse.p: How many field-value pairs can be stored in Redis Streams message payload?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Pick one or more answers

choicegroup.choice: There's no specific limit, but here must be at least one field-value pair.

div.p: A message consists of a set of field-value pairs. The set must contain at least one entry, but there's no formal upper limit.
